entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:24 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
